alert.note: Alert for Greene; Morgan; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morgan, Putnam and south central Greene Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Warfield, or over Eatonton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Madison, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Liberty, Rockville, Rock Eagle 4-H Center, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Parks Mill, Harmony, Warfield and Willard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
